results.rule_description: API Gateway must have X-Ray tracing enabled
results.impact: Without full tracing enabled it is difficult to trace the flow of logs
results.resolution: Enable tracing
results.description: X-Ray tracing is not enabled,

results.rule_description: No unauthorized access to API Gateway methods
results.impact: API gateway methods can be accessed without authorization.
results.resolution: Use and authorization method or require API Key
results.description: Authorization is not enabled for this method.

results.rule_description: No unauthorized access to API Gateway methods
results.impact: API gateway methods can be accessed without authorization.
results.resolution: Use and authorization method or require API Key
results.description: Authorization is not enabled for this method.

results.rule_description: CloudWatch log groups should be encrypted using CMK
results.impact: Log data may be leaked if the logs are compromised. No auditing of who have viewed the logs.
results.resolution: Enable CMK encryption of CloudWatch Log Groups
results.description: Log group is not encrypted.

results.description: Security group rule allows egress to multiple public internet addresses.

results.rule_description: Load balancer is exposed to the internet.
results.impact: The load balancer is exposed on the internet
results.resolution: Switch to an internal load balancer or add a tfsec ignore
results.description: Load balancer is exposed publicly.

results.rule_description: Load balancers should drop invalid headers
results.impact: Invalid headers being passed through to the target of the load balance may exploit vulnerabilities
results.resolution: Set drop_invalid_header_fields to true
results.description: Application load balancer is not set to drop invalid headers.

results.rule_description: Load balancers should drop invalid headers
results.impact: Invalid headers being passed through to the target of the load balance may exploit vulnerabilities
results.resolution: Set drop_invalid_header_fields to true
results.description: Application load balancer is not set to drop invalid headers.

results.rule_description: Use of plain HTTP.
results.impact: Your traffic is not protected
results.resolution: Switch to HTTPS to benefit from TLS security features
results.description: Listener for application load balancer does not use HTTPS.

results.rule_description: IAM policy should avoid use of wildcards and instead apply the principle of least privilege
results.impact: Overly permissive policies may grant access to sensitive resources
results.resolution: Specify the exact permissions required, and to which resources they should apply instead of using wildcards.
results.description: IAM policy document uses sensitive action 'logs:CreateLogGroup' on wildcarded resource '*'

results.rule_description: Lambda functions should have X-Ray tracing enabled
results.impact: Without full tracing enabled it is difficult to trace the flow of logs
results.resolution: Enable tracing
results.description: Function does not have tracing enabled.

results.rule_description: RDS Deletion Protection Disabled
results.resolution: Modify the RDS instances to enable deletion protection.
results.description: Instance does not have Deletion Protection enabled

results.rule_description: RDS Deletion Protection Disabled
results.resolution: Modify the RDS instances to enable deletion protection.
results.description: Instance does not have Deletion Protection enabled

results.rule_description: RDS IAM Database Authentication Disabled
results.resolution: Modify the PostgreSQL and MySQL type RDS instances to enable IAM database authentication.
results.description: Instance does not have IAM Authentication enabled

results.rule_description: RDS IAM Database Authentication Disabled
results.resolution: Modify the PostgreSQL and MySQL type RDS instances to enable IAM database authentication.
results.description: Instance does not have IAM Authentication enabled

results.rule_description: Enable Performance Insights to detect potential problems
results.impact: Without adequate monitoring, performance related issues may go unreported and potentially lead to compromise.
results.resolution: Enable performance insights
results.description: Instance does not have performance insights enabled.

results.rule_description: Enable Performance Insights to detect potential problems
results.impact: Without adequate monitoring, performance related issues may go unreported and potentially lead to compromise.
results.resolution: Enable performance insights
results.description: Instance does not have performance insights enabled.

results.rule_description: RDS Cluster and RDS instance should have backup retention longer than default 1 day
results.impact: Potential loss of data and short opportunity for recovery
results.resolution: Explicitly set the retention period to greater than the default
results.description: Instance has very low backup retention period.

results.rule_description: RDS Cluster and RDS instance should have backup retention longer than default 1 day
results.impact: Potential loss of data and short opportunity for recovery
results.resolution: Explicitly set the retention period to greater than the default
results.description: Instance has very low backup retention period.

results.rule_description: S3 Access block should block public ACL
results.impact: PUT calls with public ACLs specified can make objects public
results.resolution: Enable blocking any PUT calls with a public ACL specified
results.description: No public access block so not blocking public acls

results.rule_description: S3 Access block should block public ACL
results.impact: PUT calls with public ACLs specified can make objects public
results.resolution: Enable blocking any PUT calls with a public ACL specified
results.description: No public access block so not blocking public acls

results.rule_description: S3 Access block should block public policy
results.impact: Users could put a policy that allows public access
results.resolution: Prevent policies that allow public access being PUT
results.description: No public access block so not blocking public policies

results.rule_description: S3 Access block should block public policy
results.impact: Users could put a policy that allows public access
results.resolution: Prevent policies that allow public access being PUT
results.description: No public access block so not blocking public policies

results.rule_description: Unencrypted S3 bucket.
results.impact: The bucket objects could be read if compromised
results.resolution: Configure bucket encryption
results.description: Bucket does not have encryption enabled

results.rule_description: Unencrypted S3 bucket.
results.impact: The bucket objects could be read if compromised
results.resolution: Configure bucket encryption
results.description: Bucket does not have encryption enabled

results.rule_description: S3 Bucket does not have logging enabled.
results.impact: There is no way to determine the access to this bucket
results.resolution: Add a logging block to the resource to enable access logging
results.description: Bucket does not have logging enabled

results.rule_description: S3 Bucket does not have logging enabled.
results.impact: There is no way to determine the access to this bucket
results.resolution: Add a logging block to the resource to enable access logging
results.description: Bucket does not have logging enabled

results.rule_description: S3 encryption should use Customer Managed Keys
results.impact: Using AWS managed keys does not allow for fine grained control
results.resolution: Enable encryption using customer managed keys
results.description: Bucket does not encrypt data with a customer managed key.

results.rule_description: S3 encryption should use Customer Managed Keys
results.impact: Using AWS managed keys does not allow for fine grained control
results.resolution: Enable encryption using customer managed keys
results.description: Bucket does not encrypt data with a customer managed key.

results.rule_description: S3 Access Block should Ignore Public Acl
results.impact: PUT calls with public ACLs specified can make objects public
results.resolution: Enable ignoring the application of public ACLs in PUT calls
results.description: No public access block so not ignoring public acls

results.rule_description: S3 Access Block should Ignore Public Acl
results.impact: PUT calls with public ACLs specified can make objects public
results.resolution: Enable ignoring the application of public ACLs in PUT calls
results.description: No public access block so not ignoring public acls

results.rule_description: S3 Access block should restrict public bucket to limit access
results.impact: Public buckets can be accessed by anyone
results.resolution: Limit the access to public buckets to only the owner or AWS Services (eg; CloudFront)
results.description: No public access block so not restricting public buckets

results.rule_description: S3 Access block should restrict public bucket to limit access
results.impact: Public buckets can be accessed by anyone
results.resolution: Limit the access to public buckets to only the owner or AWS Services (eg; CloudFront)
results.description: No public access block so not restricting public buckets

results.rule_description: S3 buckets should each define an aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block
results.impact: Public access policies may be applied to sensitive data buckets
results.resolution: Define a aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block for the given bucket to control public access policies
results.description: Bucket does not have a corresponding public access block.

results.rule_description: S3 buckets should each define an aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block
results.impact: Public access policies may be applied to sensitive data buckets
results.resolution: Define a aws_s3_bucket_public_access_block for the given bucket to control public access policies
results.description: Bucket does not have a corresponding public access block.

results.rule_description: Unencrypted SNS topic.
results.impact: The SNS topic messages could be read if compromised
results.resolution: Turn on SNS Topic encryption
results.description: Topic does not have encryption enabled.
